title: Computer Science 101 - Midterm Exam
instructions: Answer all questions. MCQ questions are worth 2 marks each. Essay questions are worth 10 marks each.

questions.text: What is encapsulation in object-oriented programming?
options: Hiding implementation details and exposing only necessary information
Creating multiple instances of a class
Inheriting properties from a parent class
questions.correctAnswer: Hiding implementation details and exposing only necessary information

questions.text: Which data structure uses LIFO (Last In First Out) principle?
What is the time complexity of binary search?
Which of the following is NOT a principle of Object-Oriented Programming?
Explain the concept of polymorphism in object-oriented programming. Provide examples of compile-time and runtime polymorphism.
Describe the differences between abstract classes and interfaces in C#. When would you use one over the other?
Write a recursive function to calculate the factorial of a number. Explain how recursion works in your implementation.
What is the correct syntax for declaring a variable in C#?
options: Both A and B are correct
questions.correctAnswer: Both A and B are correct

questions.text: Which sorting algorithm has the best average-case time complexity?
Explain the concept of exception handling in C#. What are try, catch, finally blocks? Provide an example of when you would use each.
